title: Large 2 BR apartment
posting_body: Available Now   -   This apartment is located in Lakewood (south of Tacoma) but close to public transportation (bus and sounders train station) and has easy freeway access.
2 bedroom apartment with laundry room on first floor in 4-plex
BIG open yard space with shade trees
On the bus line (Pierce Transit route 204)
Close to shopping, schools, medical facilities, and freeway
Close to Lakewood Town Center Mall
Close to I-5 (512 Park & Ride) or Lakewood Bus / Train station
Close to JBLM
Screening fee is required per person (non-refundable)
Security Deposit including utility deposit (refundable) . . . .
Monthly Rent . . . . . . . .
Landlord pays for Water, Sewer and Garbage
Tenant pays for electric power, telephone, TV cable
Qualifications for approval include, but are not limited to:
*Household income from all sources must be 3 x the rent
*Have positive rental history/positive employment verification
*Criminal background check will be performed
*Bankruptcies must be discharged
*No money due to any landlord or utility company
TO SCHEDULE AN APPOINTMENT TO VIEW THE APARTMENT
RESPOND WITH: FULL NAME (Last, First, Middle - required)
AND CONTACT INFORMATION.
ADDRESS: 4504 108TH ST, SW, LAKEWOOD, WA APT#1
Thank you!
